item.title: Redis Going Non-Open-Source is a Disgrace to "Open-Source" and Public Cloud
item.description: Redis “going non-open source” is not a disgrace to Redis, but a disgrace to “open source/OSI” and even more so to public cloud. What truly matters has always been software freedom, while open source is just one means to achieve software freedom. Read more
